code_SemperKI.utilities.sparql¶

Part of Semper-KI software

Thomas Skodawessely 2024

Contains: Helper Classes to handle Sparql Queries

UNUSED! WILL BE DELETED SOON!

class code_SemperKI.utilities.sparql.SparqlQueryManager(redisConnection, oauthTokenManager, endpoint, updateEndpoint)¶
redisCon: Generic_Backend.code_General.connections.redis.RedisConnection¶
oauthTokenManager: Generic_Backend.code_General.utilities.oauth.ManageToken¶
endpoint: SPARQLWrapper.SPARQLWrapper¶
updateEndpoint: SPARQLWrapper.SPARQLWrapper¶
setup()¶

sets up the sparql query manager by loading all queries from the configured class properties containing a dict with keys from QueryType and values as path to the query file.

loadConfig(name, config)¶

loads the queries from the config dict and sets them to the sparql resource object :param name: name of the property to set :type name: str :param config: config dict containing the query paths :type config: dict

loadQueryFromPath(path)¶

Load a query from a file path

Parameters:

path (str) – The file path

Returns:

Query content

Return type:

str

sendQuery()¶

Send query via sparql to endpoint

Returns:

Query result

Return type:

JSON

getResources() → dict¶

Returns resource details

Returns:

Dictionary with resources names as key and the resource as value

Return type:

dict

getResourcesAndTypes() → dict¶

Returns resource details and types

Returns:

Dictionary with resources names as key and the resource types as array

Return type:

dict

class code_SemperKI.utilities.sparql.SparqlResource(endpoint: SPARQLWrapper.SPARQLWrapper, updateEndpoint: SPARQLWrapper.SPARQLWrapper, oauthToken: Generic_Backend.code_General.utilities.oauth.ManageToken)¶
